test-case.name: createSoftwareModuleTypes
test-case.description: Checks the correct behaviour of /rest/v1/softwaremoduletypes POST requests.

test-case.name: updateSoftwareModuleTypeOnlyDescriptionAndNameUntouched
test-case.description: Checks the correct behaviour of /rest/v1/softwaremoduletypes/{ID} PUT requests.

test-case.name: getSoftwareModuleTypesWithPagingLimitRequestParameter
test-case.description: Checks the correct behaviour of /rest/v1/softwaremoduletypes GET requests with paging.

test-case.name: getSoftwareModuleType
test-case.description: Checks the correct behaviour of /rest/v1/softwaremoduletypes/{ID} GET requests.

test-case.name: invalidRequestsOnSoftwaremoduleTypesResource
test-case.description: Ensures that the server is behaving as expected on invalid requests (wrong media type, wrong ID etc.).

test-case.name: getSoftwareModuleTypesSortedByMaxAssignments
test-case.description: Checks the correct behaviour of /rest/v1/softwaremoduletypes GET requests with sorting by MAXASSIGNMENTS field.

test-case.name: deleteSoftwareModuleTypeThatDoesNotExistLeadsToNotFound
test-case.description: Ensures that module type deletion request to API on an entity that does not exist results in NOT_FOUND.

test-case.name: getSoftwareModuleTypes
test-case.description: Checks the correct behaviour of /rest/v1/softwaremoduletypes GET requests.

test-case.name: getSoftwareModuleTypesWithPagingLimitAndOffsetRequestParameter
test-case.description: Checks the correct behaviour of /rest/v1/softwaremoduletypes GET requests with paging.

test-case.name: deleteSoftwareModuleTypeUnused
test-case.description: Checks the correct behaviour of /rest/v1/softwaremoduletypes/{ID} DELETE requests (hard delete scenario).

test-case.name: searchSoftwareModuleTypeRsql
test-case.description: Search erquest of software module types.

test-case.name: deleteSoftwareModuleTypeUsed
test-case.description: Checks the correct behaviour of /rest/v1/softwaremoduletypes/{ID} DELETE requests (soft delete scenario).

test-case.name: getSoftwareModuleTypesWithoutAddtionalRequestParameters
test-case.description: Checks the correct behaviour of /rest/v1/softwaremoduletypes GET requests with paging.

test-case.name: createSoftwareModuleTypesInvalidAssignmentBadRequest
test-case.description: Checks the correct behaviour of /rest/v1/softwaremoduletypes POST requests when max assignment is smaller than 1
